Package com.atakmap.android.imagecapture

Class TiledCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.Canvas
      • com.atakmap.android.imagecapture.TiledCanvas
  • public class TiledCanvas
extends android.graphics.Canvas
    Image which is split into tiles stored within a file This is a method of writing to/reading from bitmaps without loading the entire image into memory. Also allows canvas drawing over multiple tiles

    Supported inputs: Monochrome, RGB, RGBA Supported outputs: RGB, RGBA

      • readTile

        public android.graphics.Bitmap readTile​(int tileX,
                                        int tileY)
        Read a tile based on its cell position I.e. For a 3x3 tiled image the middle tile cell position would be tileX = 1, tileY = 1
        Parameters:
        tileX - X-position of the tile
        tileY - Y-position of the tile
        Returns:
        Bitmap copy of the tile or null if failed

      • readTile

        public android.graphics.Bitmap readTile​(int x,
                                        int y,
                                        int width,
                                        int height)
        Read a tile from the image into a bitmap
        Parameters:
        x - Left-wise position to read from
        y - Top-wise position to read from
        width - Width of the tile to read
        height - Height of the tile to read
        Returns:
        Bitmap copy of the tile or null if failed

      • writeTile

        public boolean writeTile​(android.graphics.Bitmap bmp,
                         int tileX,
                         int tileY)
        Write a bitmap to the tile at the specified cell position See readTile(int, int) for more info.
        Parameters:
        bmp - Bitmap to read from
        tileX - X-position of the tile
        tileY - Y-position of the tile
        Returns:
        True if successful

      • writeTile

        public boolean writeTile​(android.graphics.Bitmap bmp,
                         int x,
                         int y,
                         boolean tileCell,
                         boolean recycle)
        Write a bitmap to the image at a specified position
        Parameters:
        bmp - Bitmap to read from
        x - Left-wise position to write to
        y - Top-wise position to write to
        tileCell - True if the x,y pair is a tile cell location
        recycle - True if it's okay to recycle the bitmap
        Returns:
        True if successful

      • createThumbnail

        public android.graphics.Bitmap createThumbnail​(int width,
                                               int height)
        Create a thumbnail of the entire image Aspect ratio will be maintained, meaning desired width/height may not be the same as the output width/height
        Parameters:
        width - Desired width
        height - Desired height
        Returns:
        The thumbnail as a bitmap

      • postDraw

        public boolean postDraw​(CapturePP postDraw,
                        TiledCanvas.ProgressCallback callback)
        Run post-processing drawing on the entire image (1 tile at a time) Result is automatically saved back to the original image NOTE: This is meant to be run once per canvas.
        Parameters:
        postDraw - The post-processor
        callback - Progress callback
        Returns:
        True if successful

      • postDraw

        public boolean postDraw​(CapturePP postDraw)
        Run post-processing drawing on the entire image (1 tile at a time) Result is automatically saved back to the original image NOTE: This is meant to be run once per canvas.
        Parameters:
        postDraw - The post-processor
        Returns:
        True if successful

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap bytesToBitmap​(java.nio.ByteBuffer byteData,
                                                    int width,
                                                    int height,
                                                    int channels)
        Convert an array of RGB or RGBA data to an ARGB bitmap
        Parameters:
        byteData - Byte buffer
        width - Width of the bitmap
        height - Height of the bitmap
        channels - Number of channels
        Returns:
        A newly created bitmap

      • bitmapToBytes

        public static void bitmapToBytes​(android.graphics.Bitmap bmp,
                                 java.nio.ByteBuffer dest,
                                 boolean recycle)
        Convert a bitmap to an array of bytes
        Parameters:
        bmp - Bitmap to convert
        dest - Byte array to store converted RGBA pixels
        recycle - True to recycle the bitmap
